# vImage.Gamma.halfPrecision(_:)

**Case**

A user-defined gamma value with half-precision calculation.

## Declaration

```swift
case halfPrecision(Float)
```

## User Defined Gamma

- **vImage.Gamma.fullPrecision(_:)**: A user-defined gamma value with full-precision calculation.
